introduction: Form element represents a document section containing interactive controls for submitting information. Example form:

mostImportantTags.<input>: element is used to create an HTML form for user input

mostImportantTags.<textarea>: tag defines a multi-line text input control

mostImportantTags.<select>: element is used to create a drop-down list

mostImportantTags.<option>: tag defines an option in a select list

mostImportantTags.<label>: tag defines a label for several elements: input, select, textarea

advices: Forms could look complicated for begginer, try to go through this lesson one more time tomorrow
